name: Out on a Limb
description:
OUT ON A LIMB

WASD - Move
E - Absorb limb
Mouse - Aim
Left click - Shoot
Scroll / Shift / Alt - Select limb
Right click - Toss limb

[CLASSIFIED]
Subject Name: The Blob
Abilities: Power to partially absorb and manipulate organic matter
Date of Birth: ████████
Place of Birth: ████ ████ █
Favourite Food: ██████
Threat Level: MAXIMUM. DO NOT EXPOSE TO BODILY MATTER.

You are a biological weapon with one goal: Escape. Join together with the disembodied limbs of enemies you defeat to clear a path, whether by firing the weapons they hold or throwing them for a powerful explosion! Be careful though: These limbs are also the only thing standing between your enemies and you.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, with the theme of "Joined Together". It was created by the following people:

Rizzle - Team Lead, Game and Level Design, Writing
Dino0040 - Programming
M4 - Art (@amoghax330)
GravySurfKing - Music and SFX
